thread.section_title: GamerModz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GamerModz | gamermodz.com
thread.title: Corey

author: Corey
title: Corey
text:
Advertised 2 day shipping, did not mention it would take over a month to be ready to ship. It took more than 2 days to ship on top of that.
The reply to this is everything they have via a computer where people can input incorrect times and dates to cover it up. For me to even write a review and reply to one, should let you know I'm not inaccurate. I don't usually care, but for it to take over a month to recieve something you order online with "2 day priority shipping", it isn't worth the ridiculous price.
Dates are incorrect still, but that's fine. Whatever helps you sleep at night (:
